page.title: 05Southmoor Bypass
page.content: In view of many accidents that have occured on the main A420 Oxford to Swindon road in Southmoor it is proposed to build a bypass.There are two alternative routes,one running to the south of southmoor and the favoured route to the north.This latter route would cut across country between Southmoor and Longworth.The Drayton road and Beggars Lane will both become no through roads and the Parish of Longworth will effectively be split in half.To get to Southmoor it will then be necessary to go up Pine Woods road and then along the old road. Considerable opposition to this road has been expressed and there is to be a public enquiry to decide which would be the best route.
